forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 12 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
The heart of Downtown San Francisco beats under a bright sky adorned with fleeting clouds. As the afternoon sun spreads its warmth, the temperature drifts toward a comfortable 65, accompanied by cool breezes whipping in from the west-southwest at a lively pace. The air carries a refreshing crispness, ideal for an impromptu stroll along the waterfront. While the cityscape glimmers with clarity, one can still catch hints of a delicate marine layer flirting with the distant hills, reminding us of the often mercurial nature of coastal weather.

As day transitions into evening, temperatures will taper off elegantly to a cozy 52, so a light jacket is prudent for those venturing outdoors. The winds may dance less vigorously, but they will still maintain a notable presence, adding an element of spirited charm to the scene. It’s a splendid time for a casual meet-up at a cozy café or perhaps to wander through one of the city’s vibrant neighborhoods, where the evening air carries the promise of lively conversations and laughter. Whether you find yourself browsing local shops or simply pausing to take in the interplay of light and shadow across the city, the day offers an enticing palette of possibilities shaped by the weather’s gentle embrace.
